task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 8 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create team CRUD operations with member management and invite system
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create src/handlers/teams.rs 2. POST /api/teams - create team with owner role 3. GET /api/teams/:id - team details with member count 4. PATCH /api/teams/:id - update settings (owner/admin only) 5. POST /api/teams/:id/invite - generate 7-day expiring invite links 6. Implement role-based authorization middleware

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-8): Implement team management API

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test team creation, updates, member management, and invite link generation with proper authorization
